name: Savior
description:
Main function, contents

Savior is an RPG Maker-style horror adventure game that solves riddles based on clues from exploring the surroundings.
(It follows the same aspect as Ib, Mad Father, and The Witch's House.)
The goal of the game is to control Stella, the main character, so that she can get to the ground.
In order not to face sudden death, you must always pay attention and be suspicious of the things around you.
Always investigate the surroundings carefully, and use the items you have to avoid death.
Collect and use a variety of tools to get to the ground.
The save point is fixed.
It is not recommended for those who are reluctant to express violence or bloodshed.
Does not support pads.

Synopsis

Stella wakes up in the cellar of an old hospital.
It's a place of ominous energy, but Stella decides to explore the surroundings to head to the ground.
Stella finds her way through life-threatening ordeals and discovers the secrets hidden in the facility and why she came here.

Lead Stella safely to her goal.
